parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.02

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Collects all loaded [[magazines]] from all [[binocular]] muzzles and returns them in [[Array]], otherwise it returns []. This command is used for infantry weapons only.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''binocularMagazine''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] [[binocularMagazine]] [[player]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>["Laserbatteries"]</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[binocularItems]], [[addBinocularItem]], [[removeBinocularItem]], [[removeAllBinocularItems]], [[primaryWeaponMagazine]], [[secondaryWeaponMagazine]], [[handgunMagazine]]
</value></part></template></root>
